name: Pirate King of Secret Schemes, Bandit Rum
effect:
Updated: Text
[Stride]-Stride Step-[COST][Choose one or more cards from hand with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater, and discard them], and [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down.
[ACT]G Zone:If your vanguard is a grade 3 "Vampire Princess of Night Fog, Nightrose", and you did not get an Imaginary Gift this fight, [COST][choose one or more cards from hand with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater, and discard them], and [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down. Then, [COST][turn a card from G zone with the same card name as this unit face up], and you get two Imaginary Gift:Protect.
[CONT](VC):This unit's "when attack hits" effects activate even if the attack did not hit.
[AUTO](VC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, choose up to one card from your drop, call it to (RC), and it gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
productName: [G-TD08] Vampire Princess of the Nether Hour

name: Vampire Princess of Night Fog, Nightrose
